welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mierlo, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. Get ready to immerse yourself in the Dutch culture and discover all the hidden treasures this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
